name: Blitzkrieg Mop (sketch version)
description:
Basically a sketch of the game I wanted to make for AGBIC where you use a mop as your main weapon and augment it with different liquids. All you can do in this version is collect water and throw it around or attack lights (already broken or otherwise) with the wet mop to make an electric mop.

I'm still working on it because I like it and don't want to stop just even if I didn't have time during the jam to make a "wow so good I hope they keep working on it" jam game.

Only the first level is really there the rest in uncharted territory. That is not to say the first level is bug free though!

Use a controller (xbox buttons)
Analog/d-pad: Move
A: Jump
X: Attack
Y: Dip mop/Release mop contents

Press R to restart
